ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] SS Arms vs Sleeve of the Ancient
ygData.msgSnippet: i say buy em: 1) they look better, most important factor =) 2) 2k is extremely cheap for them. 3) 50 is a very low level to go to the area that they drop in.
ygData.messageBody:
i say buy em:

1) they look better, most important factor =)
2) 2k is extremely cheap for them.
3) 50 is a very low level to go to the area that they drop in.
4) they drop off a named mob whose common drop is nothing and whose rare
drop is the arms.

Shada

> I didn't consider the STR factor. I am a wimpy bard in
> regards to STR, with
> mine barely being over 100. If I didn't have some weight
> reducing bags, I
> could never loot FS weapons to sell for cash without
> exceeding my weight
> capacity. If I switched to the SS arms, not only would I
> lose the STR bonus
> for the SotA, but the extra weight from the SS arms would
> make my situation
> even worse. So guess I will stick with SotA for now.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
